Name: Bloody Maria
Ingredients: 8 drop Hot pepper sauce (red vinegar-based e.g. Tabasco)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of salt & pepper rim plus celery stick.
RIM glass with salt and pepper (moisten outside edge with lime or orange juice and dip into mix of salt and cracked black pepper).
Prepare garnish of lime wedge, coriander sprigs and celery stick.
ROLL (rotate shaker over and over, rather than shake) all ingredients with ice.
Garnish with lime wedge, coriander sprigs and celery stick.
Review: Tequila adds interesting flavours to the classic Bloody Mary.
History: Based on the classic Bloody Mary cocktail. For more information please see our page on the Bloody Mary cocktail .
